title: Y'know what? Fuck Nasus.
body:
If he's picked, you have to spend all game trying to keep him from farming, because if he does farm, he becomes an unkillable tank that can also one shot your towers and invalidate your adc. 

And in solo queue, your jungler usually seems to think "Oh, it's nasus! I don't have to gank. My top laner has got this." Even if you don't have a lane bully. Heck, even if you picked a lane bully, nasus can still buy a flask and shrug off all of your poke. He's boring to play, he's boring to play against, and he's just a badly designed champion.

Fuck Nasus.
